title: 在多世界插件的世界怎么调难度
author: yuezimeizi123

replies.author: snowclay
replies.txt_content:
yuezimeizi123 发表于 2015-9-19 15:22
mw的插件
mw的配置文件里有一个difficult。每个世界都有独立的，你看config就行。挺容易的。mw比mv简洁很多
望采纳为最佳答案

replies.author: l583657811
replies.txt_content:
到你要调难度的世界 输入/difficulty+0(和平)1(简单)2(普通)3(困难)
还有可以再你的服务器配置文件里面改就是那个改人数多少的那个

replies.author: snowclay
replies.txt_content:
请问你是mv还是mw多世界插件
mw的话配置文件夹里的difficult调0-2
mv的话difficult调peaceful-normal-hard
望采纳为最佳答案谢谢

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content:
snowclay 发表于 2015-9-19 12:37
请问你是mv还是mw多世界插件
mw的话配置文件夹里的difficult调0-2
mv的话difficult调peaceful-normal-hard
# # options.debug: must the debug output be printed?
# # options.difficulty: what is the server diffeculty?
# # options.locale: what set of lang files must be used, supported: en_US, nl_NL, de_DE, it_IT
# # spawnGroup: used to set withs worlds have what spawn, difficult to use. see official site for details
options:
  debug: false
  difficulty: NORMAL
  usecreativemode: false
  usecreativemodeinv: true
  blockEnderChestInCrea: false
  useEndPortalHandler: false
  useportalhandler: false
  useWorldSpawnHandler: false
worlds:
  DIM-1:
    seed: 7286383180507495739
    worldgen: Nether
    options: ''
    difficulty: HARD
    autoload: true
  DIM-42:
    seed: 7286383180507495739
    worldgen: OUTER
    options: ''
    difficulty: HARD
    autoload: true
  DIM1:
    seed: 7286383180507495739
    worldgen: The_End
    options: ''
    difficulty: HARD
    autoload: true
  world:
    seed: 7286383180507495739
    worldgen: Normal
    options: ''
    difficulty: HARD
    autoload: true

replies.author: zzzzzzzabczz
replies.txt_content:
yuezimeizi123 发表于 2015-9-19 15:18
# # options.debug: must the debug output be printed?
# # options.difficulty: what is the server di ...
很明显是difficulty那行吧……
至于冒号后面就是加难度的英文
HARD明显是困难
NORMAL明显是简单
……至于其他难度的英文
你去把游戏调成英文版再去调难度不就能找到了
